Story page headline: A Star Rats update from Hayden Library
Story page text: The search for Star Rats is derailed when it is discovered that Hayden Library has mysteriously disappeared.

Story page headline: Meeting with the Ministers from the Ministry of Intertextual Transportation
Story page text: Meeting with the Ministers: The library-aligned ministers give an overview of what's going on; this video provides useful information about The Ministry and should be watched before starting The Ministry puzzles.
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with the ministers from the Ministry of Intertextual Transportation. THERE IS IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR YOU HERE.
Email body: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with the Ministers of the Ministry of Intertextual Transportation.  They have important information to impart; please join at your earliest convenience Visit [link].

Story page text: Barker recalls that whatever attacked Bookspace is SOMEWHAT BUGGY.
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Barker.
Email body: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Barker. Visit [link].

Story page text: Dewey recalls that whatever attacked Bookspace has a COLORFUL HEAD.
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Dewey.
Email body: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Dewey. Visit [link].

Story page text: Hayden recalls that whatever attacked Bookspace GOES ON LONGER THAN WAR AND PEACE.
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Hayden.
Email body: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Hayden. Visit [link].

Story page text: Lewis recalls that whatever attacked Bookspace has a MULTIPART COMPOSITION.
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Lewis.
Email body: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Minister Lewis. Visit [link].

Story page text: The Rotch Brothers recall that whatever attacked Bookspace is EVEN IN WIDTH.
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Ministers Rotch and Rotch.
Email body: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Ministers Rotch and Rotch. Visit [link].

Story page text: It is revealed that Bookspace was damaged when A VORACIOUS BOOKWYRM RAN AMOK
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with the Ministers.  Check your email for details!
Email body: YOU'VE DONE IT! Thank you for jogging our memories and finding the cause of Bookspace's destruction! Gather your fellow solvers; you will shortly be receiving a second email with a link for an important communication so we can thank you personally.

Story page text: It is revealed that Bookspace was damaged when A VORACIOUS BOOKWYRM RAN AMOK
notification: You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with the Ministers.
Email body: YOU'VE DONE IT! Thank you for jogging our memories and finding the cause of Bookspace's destruction! You have been invited to a SpaceBook Messenger videochat with Ministers Rotch and Rotch. Visit [link] so we can express our gratitude.

Story page text: The wyrm becomes a lovely butterfly, when we FEED IT A NEW BERRY.
notification: You are invited to watch an amazing transformation!
Email body: You are invited to watch an amazing transformation! Visit [link].

Story page text: introduces himself. it would be useful to watch this video and get an overview of the next steps.
notification: There’s someone who would like to meet you!
Email subject: A new friend would like to meet you!
Email body: There’s someone who would like to meet you! Please visit [link] to meet your new friend.

Story page text: and explains about the plot device. This video provides useful information about Bookspace and should be watched before starting Bookspace puzzles.
notification: Tock has some useful information about Bookspace.  THERE IS IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR YOU HERE.
Email body: Tock has important information about the new world you have entered. Please view this message at your earliest convenience [link]

Story page headline: Tock offers some words of encouragement
Story page text: and hopes you will continue solving at a good pace.
notification: Tock would like to offer some words of encouragement.
Email body: Tock would like to offer some words of encouragement. Visit [link] to receive them.

Story page headline: Tock offers additional words of encouragement
notification: Tock would like to offer some additional words of encouragement.
Email body: Tock would like to offer some additional words of encouragement. Visit [link] to receive them.

Story page text: on assembling the Plot device. This video provides useful information about getting home.
notification: Tock would like to provide you with the next steps
Email body: Tock would like to congratulate you on reassembling the plot device, and provide you with the next steps you must take to get home. Visit [link].

Story page text: Watch this video to bring your LITCOIN back to Tock, then check your email.
notification: Tock is sad to see you go.
Email body: Tock is sad to see you go, but would like to say goodbye. Visit [link].
